summary: Adds a home for Nazeem on the outskirts of Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
[color=RED]DISCLAIMER: This mod is still a work in progress and has not been cleaned. Only use this mod if you're willing to test and give feedback. Otherwise, use it at your own risk.[/color]

The vanilla game currently does not have a proper home for Nazeem, even though it is clear that he was supposed to have one instead of living in the Drunken Huntsman. This mod fixes that by adding a home for Nazeem and Ahlam on the outskirts of Whiterun.

[b][size=3]Currently implemented[/size][/b]
[list][*][size=2]Wintersand Manor[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Navmesh[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]
[/size][size=3][b]To be implemented[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=2]Modified AI for Nazeem and Ahlam so that they will use the home.[/size][/*]
[*][size=2]Fast travel location[/size][/*]
[/list]
[size=3][b]Currently broken[/b][/size]
[list][*][size=2]Nazeem's AI. I have trouble with modifying the AI. If anyone is willing to help, please send me a message :).[/size][/*]
[/list][size=2]

[/size]
author: ReconWhale
